Pre-Game Insights: Fans can expect a clash of titans as the Kansas City Royals visit the New York Yankees at Yankee Stadium.
The Royals will be looking to narrow the lead of the Yankees.
The match is bound to be exciting and recommended for all baseball lovers.
Cole Ragans has proven himself an important asset for the Royals with more than 200 strikeouts and a low WHIP.
Luis Gil’s season for the Yankees is outstanding with impressive wins and losses and an ERA not worse than Ragans.
The current betting odds lean slightly towards the Yankees due to their robust home game performance and historical dominance over the Royals.
